name: GMTK Jam - Just Pidgeon
description:
Just Pidgeon

Game made in less than 48 hours for the GMTKJam 2019.The theme was "only one".

The game only uses one control: mouse clicks. But this wasn't the idea behind the concept.

"Together as one"

"Coming together to form one team"

I wanted to play with the idea of one without it being a singular thing.

Hope you'll enjoy. Thank you!

Rens
